scripts.pretest: node ./scripts/mkbuild.js && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-template.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-template.js -c -m -o build/d3-template.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-template.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-template.js build/d3-template.min.js
